com.google.sceneform.rendering

类 Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.sceneform.rendering.Renderer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    EqUiHelper.RendererCallback

    public class Renderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements EqUiHelper.RendererCallback
    渲染对象

    包含所有要渲染到surface上的内容

        public void setFrameRenderDebugCallback(java.lang.Runnable onFrameRenderDebugCallback)

      • setIndirectLight

        public void setIndirectLight(IndirectLight light)
        设置间接光

        间接光会产生一个照明,这些照明时从场景中其它物体上反射而形成的。 该节点会向场景中添加间接光,不会使用光线跟踪。

        参数:
        light - 间接光

      • getIndirectLight

        public IndirectLight getIndirectLight()
        获取间接光对象
        返回:
        间接光

        onNativeWindowChanged 在接口中 EqUiHelper.RendererCallback

      • onDetachedFromSurface

        public void onDetachedFromSurface()
        从接口复制的说明: EqUiHelper.RendererCallback
        Called when the surface is going away. After this call isReadyToRender() returns false. You MUST have stopped drawing when returning. This is called from detach() or if the surface disappears on its own.
        指定者:
        onDetachedFromSurface 在接口中 EqUiHelper.RendererCallback

      • setAntiAliasing

        public void setAntiAliasing(View.AntiAliasing antiAliasing)

      • setDithering

        public void setDithering(View.Dithering dithering)

      • enablePerformanceMode

        public void enablePerformanceMode()
        为filament设置高性能配置。禁用FXAA，禁用 后处理，禁用动态分辨率，设置质量为“低”。

      • getEnvironmentalHdrParameters

        public EnvironmentalHdrParameters getEnvironmentalHdrParameters()
